title: BUGSPLAT!?
body:
OK RIOT
This doesn't happen all the time so I play ranked anyway, but it's getting on my nerves.
When I play ranked, AND ONLY WHEN I PLAY RANKED, I sometimes get what is known as bugsplat.
I reckon it's a bit fishy since I ONLY EVER GET IT WHEN I PLAY RANKED.
Numerous times I have had to deal with time penalty, losing promo series and getting demoted because of this.
It only ever happens when I play a ranked game and I'm sick of it.

Can't you implement some kind of system that just remakes the game when someone's gotten bugsplat, so we don't have to get punished, because YOUR game broke???
Seriously, I don't know much about coding, but you know how the bugsplat message shows up? Can't you do something with that?

Fix it Riot.
